title: Exception Thrown When Exporting Data in Table Inside a Grid Cell
description: When attempting to export data in a table located within a grid cell, an exception is being thrown. This issue can be reproduced as follows:
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data in a table located within a grid cell.
EB: When exporting data from two tables placed inside grid cells, the expected result is the successful export of data. However, the actual result is an exception being thrown during the process, specifically in the 'ReportEngineService.getMetaData()' method.
SR:
1. Insert one table into a grid cell.
2. Insert another table into another grid cell.
3. Attempt to export data from these tables.
